creature_ability: Class Abilities Alchemical Weapon Expertise, Alchemy, Field Discovery, Formula Book, Iron Will, Perpetual Infusions
markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Jubilost Narthropple (Level 8)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2394)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 34

**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 34

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Jubilost Narthropple (Level 8)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2394)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 33</row>

**Perception** +11; (expert) [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Gnomish](/Languages.aspx?ID=5), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +18, [First World Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14, [Forest Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14, [Hill Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +12, [River Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Infused Items** Jubilost generally carries the following infused items (leaving two infused reagents handy for Quick Alchemy), which last for 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations: moderate [acid flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74) (12), moderate [alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75) (12), and lesser [elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91) (4).

**Items**
_[+1 striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_, _[+1 striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67)_ with 10 bolts, [Alchemist's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2), [bag of holding type II](/Equipment.aspx?ID=249), bandolier, [Bedroll](/Equipment.aspx?ID=7), belt pouch, [Chalk](/Equipment.aspx?ID=12) (10), [Explorer's Clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2), formula book, [hooded lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=29), [+1 padded armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=3), [pint of oil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=38) (2), [Rations](/Equipment.aspx?ID=40) (1 week), ring of fire resistance, sheath, [Traveler's Any-Tool](/Equipment.aspx?ID=268), [Waterskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=62), [writing set with extra ink and paper](/Equipment.aspx?ID=63), 4 gp, and 2 sp

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 104

**Resistances**
fire 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d4–1 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
moderate acid flask +15 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d6 [persistent acid damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)  and 4 acid splash damage

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
moderate alchemist's fire +15 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d8 fire plus 2 persistent fire damage and 4 fire splash damage

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
lesser acid flask +14 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6 persistent acid damage and 4 acid splash damage

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
lesser alchemist's fire +14 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d8 fire plus 1 persistent fire damage and 4 fire splash damage

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_crossbow_ +15 ([range 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d8 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 24, attack +14
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Know Direction](/Spells.aspx?ID=169), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236)

**[Alchemy](/Classes.aspx?ID=1)**   

**Formula Book**   Jubilost's formula book contains the formulas for lesser [acid flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74), moderate [acid flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74), lesser [alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75), moderate [alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75), lesser [antidote](/Equipment.aspx?ID=80), moderate [antidote](/Equipment.aspx?ID=80), moderate [antiplague](/Equipment.aspx?ID=81), lesser [bomber's eye elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=83), lesser [bottled lightning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=76), greater [darkvision elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=89), lesser [darkvision elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=89), lesser elixir of life, minor [elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91), lesser [feyfoul](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1757), moderate [feyfoul](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1757), [giant wasp venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=115), greater [leaper's elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=95), [silversheen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=134), [sunrod](/Equipment.aspx?ID=137), lesser [tanglefoot bag](/Equipment.aspx?ID=78), and [wyvern poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=132).

**[Quick Alchemy](/Actions.aspx?ID=2)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) 

**[Quick Bomber](/Feats.aspx?ID=95)** <actions string="Single Action" />  

**Research Field**   [Bomber](/ResearchFields.aspx?ID=1)

**[Sticky Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=107)** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([additive 2](/Traits.aspx?ID=4)) 

**Ancestry Feats**   [Fey Fellowship](/Feats.aspx?ID=27), [First World Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=28)

**Class Feats**   [Calculated Splash](/Feats.aspx?ID=99), [Directional Bombs](/Feats.aspx?ID=104), [Far Lobber](/Feats.aspx?ID=94), [Quick Bomber](/Feats.aspx?ID=95), Sticky Bomb

**General Feats**   [Incredible Initiative](/Feats.aspx?ID=794), [Toughness](/Feats.aspx?ID=855)

**Skill Feats**   [Alchemical Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=752), [Assurance](/Feats.aspx?ID=756) (Nature), [Inventor](/Feats.aspx?ID=798), [Multilingual](/Feats.aspx?ID=814), [Specialty Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=844) (alchemy), [Unmistakable Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=860)

**Class Abilities Alchemical Weapon Expertise, Alchemy, Field Discovery, Formula Book, Iron Will, Perpetual Infusions**  ([lesser acid flask](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [lesser alchemist's fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=7), [[Research Field](/classes/alchemist/research-fields)](/Traits.aspx?ID=397)) 

</column>
name: Jubilost Narthropple (Level 8)
